description:
Minor code issue, but recording for Diablo:

LibvirtConnection assigns self.interfaces_xml, but never uses it.

self.interfaces_xml = open(FLAGS.injected_network_template).read()
title: self.interfaces_xml is assigned in LibvirtConnection but never used
